description: Spacious and secure studio with plenty of large windows in the heart of Chelsea. It is a very safe neighborhood and just a few minutes away from the 123 and ACE stations, and close to Whole Foods, Chelsea Market, Flatiron Building, The Highline, and the Whitney Museum. Has a full size bathroom with bathtub, high quality queen bed, and a full size couch that is comfortable enough to sleep on. The kitchen is small but has a range, oven, fridge and microwave
name: Spacious sunny studio in Chelsea
